description: Luffy stretches his body across a gap to create a makeshift suspension bridge that others can walk across. This anime-only technique demonstrates creative non-combat use of the Gomu Gomu no Mi's rubber properties.

keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Tsuribashi for the first time to help Nami cross a gap on Warship Island.

notes: This is an anime-only technique that never appears in the manga. It's called 'Gum-Gum Suspension Bridge' in Funimation dub and 'Rubber Bridge' in Odex dub.

description: The power granted by the Hiso Hiso no Mi, allowing the user to telepathically communicate with and understand the minds of any animal. This ability proved crucial for understanding Ryu's needs and communicating with Sea Kings.

keyMoments.description: Apis uses her telepathy to communicate with a Sea King, pulling its nostril hair to make it sneeze and save the crew.
Apis officially reveals the name of her Devil Fruit and explains how it works to the Straw Hats.

notes: Anime-only ability from a non-canon Devil Fruit. The telepathy is one-way communication where Apis can understand animals but they may not understand complex human concepts from her.
